name: FWOG
description:
My game for Ludum Dare 50!

Play as FWOG, the cyborg frog, running from a giant laser. 
How far can you get before the laser gets you?

(the Windows version is a bit more stable than the browser version)

Controls:
Left/A - Left Leg
Right/D - Right Leg
Up/W - Move Arms Up
Down/S - Move Arms Down
M - Mute/Unmute Music
Esc - Exit
